activities: EDM Americas, Inc. is a business process outsourcing service that provides end to end information processing services for the insurance and financial markets. EDM Americas utilizes leading technology and IT infrastructure resulting in streamlined and secured information management for our clients. EDM Americas receives personal insurance information from the UK for processing in the US. EDM Americas offers services in the US that include data capture, imaging, and storage.
personaldata: Health and Life insurance records including electronically stored and paper files.
privacyprograms: ISO certified policies and procedures regarding control of client supplied information. Service Organization Controls external audit (SOC2) of controls regarding client information in terms of confidentiality, privacy and security.
recoursemech: With respect to any disputes relating to this Policy that cannot be resolved through our internal processes, EDM Americas, Inc. participates in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European Union Data Protection Authorities to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles.
